name: War Without End
description:
Mother Nature has long since claimed the land which was once home to the human race, with decades of electrical storms, snow and rain the world that was once so vibrant now lies sunken and empty below the cold, black sea. Resources are few and scattered for those survivors that managed to flee behind the steel flood walls. There is possibly enough to share, but mankind has never been known for it's wisdom and diplomacy.
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
War Without End is a group which hosts massive battles every weekend between four main factions. Want to be involved? Join the Disc at the link below!
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
